summary: NO ACCELERATION TO VERY DANGEROUS FAST ACCELERATION WITHOUT ANY SIGN.   DETAILS: STEPPED ON GAS SOFTLY, SLOWLY ACCELERATED, VERY SLOW. KEPT SAME PRESSURE, SUDDENLY, THE CAR RUSHED... FORTUNATELY, NO CAR AHEAD OF ME.       COULD NOT ACCELERATE AT ALL!  SAME TRIP AS ABOVE. AFTER RED LIGHT, STEPPED ON GAS PEDAL, RPM REACHED 4K+ RPM QUICKLY, SPEED KEPT BELOW 15MPH, ENGINE VERY LOUD.     TURNED OFF CAR. RESTART, BACK TO NORMAL WITH "VERY SLOW" RESPONSE FROM GAS PEDAL. MANAGED TO GET BACK HOME.   *TR
